directions: In a 12-inch skillet bring water and soy sauce with garlic to a boil. Add broccoli rabe and cook, covered, over moderately high heat 2 minutes. Remove cover and cook until water is evaporated and broccoli rabe is tender. Season broccoli rabe with salt.
ingredients: 1 bunch broccoli rabe, hollow or coarse stems discarded
title: Steamed Broccoli Rabe with Garlic
